comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Indeed, this afternoon SB and I shared asphalt for the first time in a week, a very long time in Frenzy terms. It was like the reunion of two old stage-mates, say Crosby and Stills or the Captain and Tenille. Or maybe Lennon and McCartney. In fact, we really don't get along well at all. I'll be glad when this damn contract expires. DU

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: If DU and I agree on one thing, it's that this contract is bogus! So, like Axl Rose, I'm going to [go underground](http://www.guardian.co.uk/music/2009/jun/09/guns-n-roses-axl-rose). Maybe I should cut off the cornrows too?

comments.author: Werner
comments.body: Some other potential duos you two could be related to are: Laurel and Hardy Abbott and Costello Sony and Cher Click and Clack Even Stevphen :-) Mark.
